#Text=Tenzin says : " Nothing like a ten - mile hike first thing in the morning . "
#Text=Yung says : " Do n't these robes come in a warm bison fur version ? "
#Text=Tenzin says : " No !

#Text= Bumi says : " If it were n't so cold , I 'd go right back to sleep .

column1: #Text=" Tenzin says : " Then , this is the perfect time to learn meditation and proper breathing technique .
#Text=Airbenders are able to warm themselves only with their breathing .
#Text=Everyone get into the lotus position .
#Text=Ah , this is so much more refreshing than sleeping .
#Text=" Bumi says : " You know when I said that thing about an iron fist - " Tenzin says : " Hush !
#Text=Meditation time .
#Text=Focus .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Can we go back to bed now ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Now that we 're refreshed and loose from our hike and meditation , it 's time for a balancing exercise .
#Text=The key is to maintain your heaven and earth connection .
#Text=Now you try .
#Text=Back up your posts !
#Text=It 's not hard if you concentrate .
#Text=Get back up !
#Text=What 's the matter , you ca n't handle it , soldier ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Do n't you think you 're a little hard on them .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Do n't worry , they can take it .
#Text=You 'll see .
#Text=Ignore the lemurs digging in your ears .
#Text=Concentrate on your breathing and , you wo n't even know they 're there !
#Text=When the head is shaved , an airbender is able to feel the wind around him .
#Text=It is both humbling and freeing .
#Text=" Kai says : " Hey , you want to go sneak away and check on the baby bisons ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Shhh .
#Text=You should be paying attention .
#Text="
